description: This file contains unit tests for file and directory operations within a C++ project, using the Google Test framework. The tests verify file creation, reading, writing, and directory traversal functionalities, referencing internal classes like 'File' and 'Directory'.

classes.name: File
classes.description: A class representing file operations such as create, open, read, write, move, and destroy.

classes.name: Directory
classes.description: A class representing directory operations such as create path, list contents, and check if valid.

methods.name: File::Create
methods.description: Creates the file with optional write permissions.

methods.name: File::SetSize
methods.description: Sets the size of the file.

methods.name: Directory::Next
methods.description: Iterates to the next item in the directory listing.

methods.name: Directory::Name
methods.description: Returns the name of the directory entry.

methods.name: File::FileName
methods.description: Retrieves the filename from a path.

methods.name: File::FileNameExtended
methods.description: Retrieves the filename with extension from a path.

methods.name: File::PathName
methods.description: Retrieves the directory path from a full file path.

methods.name: File::Extension
methods.description: Retrieves the extension of the filename.

methods.name: File::Size
methods.description: Returns the size of the file.
